snippet.title: Kimi ni Steady [Psx] - Intro
snippet.description:
Kimi ni Steady is a dating simulation game that was first released in PC Windows in the year 1998. In the game the player takes the role of young high school student that wants to find love before Christmas, the game begins in September and he got 4 months to find the perfect girl for him.

The game features 9 girls to talk to, date, and also different events to increase or decrease the grade of affinity that the player got with each girl (that will depends of his talking with them, the mini games and other factors). There are also different mini games to play.

The game features japanese voice acting and also different endings depending of the player choices during the game.



Device:
Playstation Classic
Bleemsync 1.2
OTG
Sandisk Cruzer Blade 128 GB

Capture:
Ezcap 284 hd video capture
